official-title.#text: To delay the enforcement of the Medicare two-midnight rule for short inpatient hospital stays until the implementation of a new Medicare payment methodology for short inpatient hospital stays, and for other purposes.

text.#text: Not later than 2 years after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the
shall develop a proposed ICD10–to–CPT crosswalk which shall be made available for public comment for a period of not less than 60 days.

text.#text: Publication of notice of proposed rulemaking in the Federal Register.
